attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFjZlRxeOZQhA9rDjt_description
attribs.current: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFjbgoW6G2DtugXz3B_description
attribs.current: The hound exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFjbgpuiFHxV9Ba1Tg_description
attribs.current: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFjbgpuiFHxV9Ba1Th_description
attribs.current: The hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: Understands Infernal But Can't Speak It
